title: 51: Getting the Business – The Art of Networking
description: Business networking can result in multiple referral sources. So who gets the business?
itunes:subtitle: Business networking can result in multiple referral sources. So who gets the business?
itunes:summary: Business networking can result in multiple referral sources.  So who gets the business? Laura and Larry discuss how to divvy up referrals to fellow professionals and what to look for in pairing clients and friends with networking associates.
itunes:author: hpd architecture + interiors
